title: ProLight + Sound 2023: Day Four - The Light Sound Journal
summary: ProLight+Sound 2023 showcased new products from several companies in the lighting and entertainment industry, including Visual Productions, Luminex, LumenRadio, Martin, and Hollyland. These products include new network switches, wireless DMX systems, weather-resistant lighting fixtures, and a full-duplex wireless intercom system with advanced noise cancellation technology. These advancements reflect the industry's commitment to innovation, reliability, and user-friendliness.

title: Global Raman Spectroscopy Market Report 2023: Increased Focus on Drug Development in the Healthcare Sector ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global Raman spectroscopy market is projected to grow at a CAGR of 7.0% from 2023 to 2028, reaching USD 1.1 billion by 2028.  Handheld and portable Raman instruments are expected to dominate the market due to their ease of use and portability.  The report highlights the increasing adoption of Raman spectroscopy in various fields, including drug development, food safety, and mineral analysis.
